title: Quarry Zone, Notified SEZ, designated port/harbour areas, wildlife corridor and biosphere reserves, Gaothan / Congested Area
clause_text: Quarry Zone, Notified SEZ, designated port/harbour areas, wildlife corridor and biosphere reserves, Gaothan / Congested Area. The historical and archaeological places notified under the relevant act Any other area that may be declared by the Govt. of Maharashtra from time to time.
